The MBC: MIC ratio â‰¥ 8 is considered as an indicator of bacteriostatic activity.
23 In the current study, MIC/MBC of both SNP and ZEO were 1:1, suggesting a bactericidal effect on Staph. aureus and Salm. Typhimurium. It was demonstrated that oregano EO reveals a synergistic activity with common antibiotics such as gentamicin against some potential pathogens,
24 additive activity in combination with another antibiotic such as amoxicillin and polymyxin on Extended-Spectrum Beta-Lactamase (ESBL)-producing E.coli,
25 and synergistic with other EO obtained from Thymus vulgare and Rosmarinus officinalis.
